description: The Virginia Tech Hokies (14-4, 4-1 ACC) host the Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets (13-6, 3-2 ACC) following Elizabeth Kitley's 30-point showing in the Hokies' 89-81 loss to Florida State. The game is at 6:00 PM ET on Thursday, January 25, 2024.

headline: McKneely scores 20, Beekman adds 19 and 11 assists; Virginia beats Ga. Tech 75-66
description: — Issac McKneely hit six 3-pointers and finished with 20 points, Reece Beekman added 19 points and a season-high 11 assists Saturday night to help Virginia beat Georgia Tech 75-66.

headline: Georgia Tech vs Boston College Stats, game time, and more
description: The Boston College Eagles (11-8, 2-3 ACC) visit the Georgia Tech Yellow Jackets after losing four straight road games. The matchup tips at 2:00 PM ET on Sunday, January 21, 2024.

headline: Deja Kelly hits clinching free throws, scores 27 as No. 23 North Carolina women beat Georgia Tech
description: — Deja Kelly scored 27 points, including six free throws in the last 22.5 seconds, and No. 23 North Carolina held off Georgia Tech 73-68 on Thursday night.

headline: No. 22 Florida State women beat Georgia Tech 95-80 in an ACC opener behind Latson's 30 points
description: — Ta’Niya Latson scored 30 points, Makayla Timpson had 20 points and 14 rebounds for her 19th career double-double and No. 22 Florida State beat Georgia Tech 95-80 on Friday in an ACC opener.
